app.title: AI Video Enhancer - Utool
app.description:
From blurry to brilliant ‚Äî enhance videos with AI clarity and style. ‚ú®

Utool - AI Video Editor & Quality Enhancer is the one-stop AI video and photo editing app. With our AI tools, you can turn your old, damaged yearbook photos/videos into high quality. It's like having an AI mirror of your own.

Easy to use our AI tools to edit photos & videos. Have fun sharing on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and impress your friends and followers. Try this AI anime filter & AI video enhancer, remini your art dreams to life!

Free & No Watermark!

TOP FEATURESüèÖ:

‚ö° AI Edits
- AI Video Enhancer: Enhanced AI algorithms auto-remove noise, sharpen details, and enhance colors with HD/4K resolution. 
- AI Photo Enhancer: Unblur, restore, upscale and enhance any image you want, easy retouch makes skin smoother.
- AI Art Photo Generator: Turn your photo into art like PixVerse. 
- Create unique Avatar with AI filters, effects & enhancer for your photos & videos.
- AI Editor: AI magic eraser for photo object remover, AI expand image, resizer...
- Beauty HD Cam: Take high-quality selfies with trendy effects, and filters.

üíØ Video Quality Enhancer 
With Utool's AI Enhancer, you can relive your cherished yearbook moments come to life in AI mirror art. Just one tap, our AI video enhancer tool can restore vintage videos & family recordings to better quality and the resolution can be up to 4K. 

Use AI tools to enhance the quality of your videos and photos. One-tap remini, unblur & retouch unclear memories to high-quality portraits. Deblur, sharpen & enhance photo/video to better quality.

‚ñ∫ Turn photos into art
Just upload your selfie, Utool's AI Art Generator can help you cartoon yourself into cartoon avatar easily. 

Avatar Maker
ü™Ñ AI HD enhancer for perfect anime results
‚ö° Swift image and video generation powered by an efficient AI tool
üé® Tailored Imagination - generate personalized images just for you
üöÄ One-Click Sharing - showcase your AI art and inspire others with your creativity
üîÉ Regular updates - Utool‚Äôs art styles never cease to evolve, keeping your creations fresh and exciting

üåü Pro HD Camera
With this AI photo & video editor,  you can instantly take great-looking perfect selfies and touch-up your photos and videos with trendy effects, filters and music
‚ù§ Professional effects with different styles
‚ù§ Stylish HDR ‚Äì Improve images captured in low-light and backlit scenes
‚ù§ Real-time Filter ‚Äì Preview filter effect before taking pictures or shooting videos

üìπ Pro Video Recorder
This must-have video & photo editor helps you capture smooth & clear screen videos in the easiest way. Just with a tap on the floating ball, you can record HD video tutorials, video calls and videos that can not be downloaded. 

This powerful screen recorder with audio/sound will record your voice & internal audio fluidly and clearly. No recording time limit. Export Full HD video with custom settings: 240p to 1080p, 60FPS, 12Mbps...

üéµ Music Video Maker
Bring your videos to life with our built-in music, add background music, sound effects, and more to your videos. Best Music Video Maker for TikTok!

‚úÇÔ∏è Video Cutter & Trimmer
Easy to crop and trim your photos and videos to the perfect size and remove unwanted parts.

With Utool - AI Video Enhancer & Editor, you have all AI editing tools you need to create stunning visuals and bring your memory to life. Experience the power of professional-grade photo and video editing at your fingertips now!

üî• And that's just the beginning! More exciting video & photo editing tools coming soon, including AI filters & effects, AI background eraser, auto-caption, video to audio and more.

If you have any ideas or suggestions about Utool - AI Video Enhancer & Editor, feel free to contact us at feedback@utoolapp.com

app.summary: AI Photo Video Editor with Quality Enhancer, Remover, AI retouch & Art effects.

reviews.text: I have a lot of old videos & photos of family & pets I have wanted to enhance for a long time now. & now I finally can. I love that I can still improve extremely long videos, worth the extra time to edit them 5 minutes at a time. Loving the new addition of the video stabilizer as well, as well as all other features. Worth the premium cost. Looking forward to future features. Continue with the excellent work & thank you!
reviews.replyText: Thank you so much for your thoughtful feedback! üòä We're truly honored that Utool is helping you preserve and enhance your precious memories with family and pets. It means a lot to us that you're enjoying feature. We're constantly working on bringing more powerful and helpful tools. Thanks again for being a Premium user and part of our journey! üíñ‚ú®

reviews.text: Super wow, this app is amazing! It has everything you need, from editing photos to enhancing photos and videos, and even editing long videos with AI features. The best part? If you can't afford the premium version, you can watch ads to still use its features. This app is so useful - it's a one-stop-shop for all your photo and video editing needs. I highly recommend it!
reviews.replyText: Thank you for supporting Utool ‚Äì AI Video Enhancer & Editor! We are glad you enjoy using Utool for editing and hope it can help you improve the video quality. If you have any further suggestions or needs, please feel free to contact us at feedback@utoolapp.com. We will continue to improve and provide better experience and more editing features.‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.text: I really like this app. The Pro is much better... I hate ads. The effects are pretty awesome, and I recommend üëç Here's a two month update. I still love Utool for its ease of use, features, and detailed video editing. I still recommend it.
reviews.replyText: Thank you soooo much, Lor√∞‚ù§Ô∏è. Really appreciate for your big support! We will keep on updating and improving.

reviews.text: The enlargement, deletion, and reconstruction functions are similar to the A.I. of smartphone gallery apps, but they are more effective at enlarging images and provide a more beautiful background. However, most errors occur when it comes to human bodies, such as hands with more than five fingers or abnormal limbs.

Surprisingly good results using the AI enhance on here! I tried at least 4 other apps before this one and none of them could enhance the quality this well without changing the color/hue of the photo or jacking up the brightness. I'm really impressed with these results.
reviews.replyText: Hi, Natalia! Thank you for choosing our Utool - AI enhancer. We're here to make your photos and videos shine brighter, and we're thrilled you've noticed the care and warmth we put into our work. Together, we'll keep making improvements to cherish your memories beautifully. üíñüåà

reviews.text: Does that even count as an ai app? It's extremely good but i have one issue. The magic eraser, every time i erase something it keeps bits of it like i tried to take a photo of my ball, i tried to erase my hand to look like it's floating. But when i erased it, it chopped my hand in the photo in a way a bullet can't even do plus, it doesn't erase reflections. Googles ai magic eraser is 1000000000% than this. Reply to developer: ok, thanks
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your feedback! We‚Äôre sorry that our tool didn‚Äôt work as expected. We‚Äôre continuously working to improve our feature for a more natural effect. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we‚Äôll strive to enhance our tool to meet expectations. Stay tuned for updates‚Äîwe‚Äôre committed to continuous improvement! üôå

reviews.text: this app is a SCAM. I just spent my money on trash. I feel so bad. this app doesn't even enhance the video it just reduces a tiny bit of noise no blur fixation no sharpness added no quality enhanced at all what's worst is when u try to reapply the enhancer to maximize the quality it doest not do anything I retried 3 to 4 times.. and takes a hell lot of time. I just wasted my money.
reviews.replyText: We're truly sorry for disappointing experience. Our goal is to provide meaningful video enhancement and let results meet expectations. Please feel free send us the original and processed videos to feedback@utoolapp.com so we can investigate and improve. We‚Äôd also be happy to provide any help you need. Your feedback is very important to us.

reviews.text: Best video quality enhancer ever! Not many ads not locked behind a pay wall, and good results! I'm an editor, and this app is perfect for edits best one yet.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for supporting Utool ‚Äì AI Video Enhancer & Editor! We are glad you enjoy using Utool for editing and hope it can help you improve the video quality. If you have any further suggestions or needs, please feel free to contact us at feedback@utoolapp.com. We will continue to improve and provide better experience and more editing features.‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.text: It's not too shabby. The Ai photo filters are very good, and I would give 5 stars just for 3 of their many filters. I've been chasing my pets around trying to get new pictures to morph. They seem annoyed... Also, it's way faster video upscale processing than the other apps of similar ilk. The bad, but understandable, part is the 15-second limit for free and 5 minute limit for pro. Servers are pricey... ü§ë
reviews.replyText: Thank you for understanding that server costs require charges.ü•∫ Enhance is free for videos under 15s and the feature is constantly improving for better results. Your support, understanding, and positive ratings are crucial for us. We greatly value your support and comprehension.

reviews.text: it's a good app but for the love of God what is the name of it? because I can tell it shows up as three different names. for instance on my home screen that says AI video however when I search for AI video it's nowhere to be found. If I search U tool nothing comes up. Frustrating to find. It's got a hidden name.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your feedback! üòä We apologize for any confusion regarding our AI video enhance app name - Utool, it may show "AI video enhancer" on your phone. We appreciate your feedback and we will work on making the app easier to find in the next update!

app.AIReview:
AI Video Enhancer - Utool Review

Overview

AI Video Enhancer ‚Äì Utool is an AI-powered mobile application designed to transform low-quality videos and photos into visually appealing content. With over 7.6 million installs and a robust 4.64 rating, the app has clearly found traction with users seeking quick and effective video enhancement solutions. Marketed as a one-stop shop for both photo and video editing, Utool leverages artificial intelligence to address common issues like blurriness, damage, and outdated aesthetics. The core functionality revolves around AI-driven quality improvement, style application, and removal of imperfections ‚Äì features intended to revitalize old media and elevate new creations for social sharing platforms such as YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and Facebook.

Key Features

Utool offers a comprehensive suite of features centered around its AI capabilities:

  • AI Video Enhancer: The flagship feature utilizes AI algorithms to deblur, sharpen, upscale, and generally improve the quality of videos, particularly those with low resolution or significant noise. It promises to transform grainy footage into clearer images.
  • AI Photo Enhancer (Remini): This component utilizes a similar technology to Utool's video enhancement, focusing on restoring detail and clarity in photographs, effectively removing blur and aging effects. The app prominently advertises its use of the Remini technology.
  • AI Anime Filter: Specifically designed for transforming regular videos into anime-style visuals, this filter adds stylistic elements like cell shading, bright colors, and stylized outlines.
  • Photo Remover: This feature employs AI to detect and remove unwanted objects or people from photos with surprising accuracy. This is particularly useful for removing distractions in portraits or landscape shots.
  • AI Retouch & Art Effects: Utool provides a selection of artistic filters and retouching tools, allowing users to apply various styles and effects to their media, going beyond simple quality enhancement. These include options mimicking classic paintings and other creative looks.
  • Batch Processing (Premium Feature): Users with the paid subscription can process multiple videos or photos simultaneously, significantly speeding up workflow for large projects.
  • Social Sharing Integration: Seamless integration with popular social media platforms allows users to directly share their enhanced content without exporting and re-uploading.

Strengths

Utool‚Äôs success is built on several key strengths:

  • Ease of Use: The app boasts a remarkably intuitive interface, making it accessible even to users unfamiliar with video editing software. The focus on AI handles much of the technical complexity for the user.
  • Effective AI Performance: Across various tests, the AI-powered enhancements demonstrated noticeable improvements in video and photo quality, particularly with footage exhibiting blur or low resolution. The Remini integration is a significant selling point, consistently delivering impressive results.
  • Broad Feature Set: The combination of multiple editing tools ‚Äì including removal, retouching, and artistic effects ‚Äì expands the app's utility beyond simple quality enhancement. This caters to a wider range of creative needs.
  • Large User Base & Positive Reviews: The high number of installs (7,678,157) and impressive rating (4.64/5) indicate significant user satisfaction and widespread adoption.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Utool isn‚Äôt without areas needing refinement:

  • Processing Time: While generally quick, the AI processing can sometimes be slow, especially with longer videos or complex edits. A clear visual indicator of progress would be beneficial.
  • Over-Processing Issues: In certain instances, the AI appears to over-process images and videos, resulting in an unnatural or artificial look ‚Äì particularly evident when applying overly aggressive sharpening or stylistic filters. Manual adjustment controls could mitigate this.
  • Limited Control Over AI Parameters: Users have limited control over the specific parameters of the AI algorithms. More granular settings would allow for greater customization and predictable results. A ‚Äúpreview‚Äù mode before full processing is needed.
  • Watermark (Free Version): The presence of a watermark on videos created using the free version is a deterrent, especially considering the app‚Äôs robust features.

User Experience

The user experience within Utool is generally polished and straightforward. Navigation is intuitive, with clearly labeled buttons and icons guiding users through the various editing options. The onboarding process is simple, immediately presenting the core functionalities. The interface feels responsive, although as mentioned previously, processing times can occasionally feel protracted. The app's reliance on visual cues ‚Äì particularly highlighting areas affected by the AI ‚Äì contributes to a positive user experience.

Value for Money

Utool operates on a freemium model. The free version provides access to basic video and photo enhancement features along with limited use of the AI Anime Filter and Photo Remover. However, it's heavily marked with a watermark. The premium subscription unlocks unlimited processing, removes the watermark, grants access to all filters and effects, and enables batch processing. Given the impressive results achievable with the core AI enhancements, the premium subscription appears justifiable for serious users or those regularly creating enhanced content. The pricing structure is competitive compared to other similar apps on the market (currently around $4.99/month or $29.99/year).

Conclusion

AI Video Enhancer ‚Äì Utool represents a compelling solution for individuals seeking an easy-to-use tool to revitalize their old videos and photos. The app‚Äôs core AI capabilities deliver impressive results, particularly in terms of video quality enhancement and photo restoration. While there are areas for improvement regarding processing speed, control over AI parameters, and the watermark on the free version, Utool's strengths ‚Äì ease of use, effective AI performance, and a broad feature set ‚Äì make it a worthwhile download, especially considering its popularity and positive user reviews. The app is a solid choice for casual users and those wanting to quickly improve their media without needing advanced video editing skills.
